_header: As I me rose in a morning
_description: Song of the Virgin Mary lulling her Child — five quatrains and burden: ‘Modyr whyt os lyly flowr / Yowr lullyng lessyth my langovr’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
As I vp ros in a mornyngMy thowth was on a mayd
                    ȝyng…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Therfor be mery and glade& make vs mery owr
                    savowr
